word:
At times you have good impulses, and you heed the impressions of the Spirit of God. But you have little real hatred of meanness, and you receive the enemy . . . as an honored guest. You glorify him by opening the door of 


                                    -202- 

your heart to him. You do not see him by your side, but he is there, and when led by satanic agencies, you lead others in the same way.
